text: what's up everyone around the world
watching this video right now I'm coming
to you live from Scottsdale Arizona this
is actually the same house that I grew
up in until college and I'm here with my
family during these really really rough
times I am self-quarantine
I'm pretty sure that you guys are too
and the whole world as we know it is a
mess right now and it's kind of on pause
with this pandemic happening so I wanted
to put my camera down and just speak to
you guys about what's next for me how
this is affecting my travel plans etc to
back up a little bit in January and
February I was traveling around Asia
first in the Philippines and Hongkong
and Myanmar and that was kind of at the
start of the outbreak and things weren't
really affected that much travel was
going on as normal and then I came over
here to the Americas I was in the
Dominican Republic and Panama three
weeks ago and things were still okay and
then as soon as I got to the US two
weeks ago
things started getting really bad all
sports were canceled within the realm of
possibilities it's just seemed more like
out of a movie
everybody went into a panic toilet paper
has gone off the shelves this is just
not at all what anyone imagined here and
New York City is now the epicenter of
the corona virus worldwide I'm sure a
lot of you guys know that I have six
countries left until I finished my
lifelong goal of visiting every country
in the world
they are Palau Saudi Arabia Ghana
Ecuador Venezuela and Jamaica I will
still be shooting a 90-minute doc called
border 197 which encompasses my whole
life to visit every country it's going
to be a lot of behind the scenes a lot
of hidden stories and a lot of my
realizations from being one of the 200
or so people to visit every country and
I'm really looking forward to it
although our original starting date was
May 15th and in all likelihood that will
be pushed back one month maybe even two
or three months nobody really knows but
I'm just kind of hanging tight and as
we're in the scripting process right now
I would like to open up the floor to you
and get your thoughts on what would you
like to hear from a documentary about me
a guy who visited every country in the
world what kind of things would you like
to hear the most please comment them
below I will be checking and reading
them and taking them to heart it would
really really help us in our creative
process so thank you for that in the
meantime I'll just be here in Arizona
enjoying the beautiful weather it's
about 75 degrees in sunny that's like 26
Celsius so there's not too much to
complain about it's been really nice to
kind of take a step back and enjoy time
with my family and friends and to be
honest with you guys sometimes I travel
so fast and I'm shooting so many videos
that in the blink of an eye it's all
gone I don't really have time to sit
down and think about and process life as
it's happening and right now I'm able to
do all of those things so it's actually
a blessing if you look at it from that
point of view also I've been thinking
that everyone's gonna have a really
itchy feet by the time this is all done
especially myself people that really
itching to get out and travel so I
actually think that my last six
countries and the documentary will be
great timing for people to kind of see
the world and bring a lot of positivity
around after we get through this crisis
so that is a life update from me I hope
you guys are staying inside washing your
hands continuing to express gratitude
enjoy time with your family and live
every moment like it's your last because
we don't know what is going to happen
with this world but if you ask me I'm
positive and optimistic and I hope you
guys are too thank you so much have a
great day and I'll see you guys tomorrow
[Music]
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
